thread.section_title: Inkfarm.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Inkfarm.com | www.inkfarm.com | 2 of 806
thread.title: James

author: James
title: James
text:
I was happy to find Inkfarm. It is now my go-to choice to get replacement cartridges for my ink jet printer. The company ships cartridges quickly, and frequently offers discounts. The company website makes it easy to place an order. And, regarding quality, friends regularly compliment me on the quality of the glossy-paper color photos I print out.
The one thing I wish Inkfarm offered was an easy way for customers to return used cartridges either for refill or for some sort of credit on the next order.
